mapper.sql: id, uid, dpid, syn_month, syn_year, syn_ratio, eve_month, eve_year, eve_ratio, reg_month, reg_year, reg_ratio, sea_month, sea_year, sea_ratio, els_month, els_year, els_ratio, bas_month, bas_year, bas_ratio, total_count, total_ratio, create_time,update_time
mapper.select: SELECT h1.id, z1.name, h1.dpid, h1.* FROM `hidden_plan` h1 LEFT JOIN zzjg_department_tbl z1 ON h1.dpid = z1.id and z1.del = 0 WHERE h1.uid = #{uid} and h1.total_count != 0 ORDER BY dpid ASC

SELECT SUM(syn_month) danger21, SUM(syn_year) danger22,SUM(syn_ratio) danger23,
SUM(eve_month) danger24, SUM(eve_year) danger25,SUM(eve_ratio) danger26,
SUM(reg_month) danger27, SUM(reg_year) danger28,SUM(reg_ratio) danger29,
SUM(sea_month) danger30, SUM(sea_year) danger31,SUM(sea_ratio) danger32,
SUM(els_month) danger33, SUM(els_year) danger34,SUM(els_ratio) danger35,
SUM(bas_month) danger36, SUM(bas_year) danger37,SUM(bas_ratio) danger38,
SUM(total_count) danger39, SUM(total_ratio) danger40
FROM `hidden_plan`
WHERE uid = #{uid}
